snippet: Chicago signed its first-round draft pick, the Kentucky point guard Marquis Teague.
abstract: Chicago Bulls sign Kentucky point guard Marquis Teague, Chicago's first-round draft pick, as backup to Derrick Rose, who is recovering from a knee injury; other basketball items noted.
lead_paragraph: Chicago signed its first-round draft pick, the Kentucky point guard Marquis Teague.

headline.main: Bulls Sign Kentucky’s Teague as Backup to Rose at Guard
headline.print_headline: Bulls Sign Kentucky’s Teague As Backup to Rose at Guard
